text: 10.21 Mat 6.19-20, 10.38, Mak 8.34, Luk 12.33 Agek, Jisas nop mapen lɨl agak, Tap nokom olap nep ma gɨpan agak. Amɨl, tap nad tɨtay mɨdeb okok mɨdupsek yokɨl mani dɨl, binɨb tap ma mɨdeb okok kɨlop ñɨnɨmɨn agak. Anɨgɨl nɨm, nad tap teplep yenɨgab, God man ne alaŋ agak. Apin tek gɨl apɨl, yad ayɨp ajonɨgul agak.
